response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $1,500,000 to you. After careful consideration, we are offering this exceptional opportunity to you at a special price of $1,400,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. We believe this price reflects the true value of the product while providing you with a significant benefit. We look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your business or personal endeavors.", "product_price": 1400000}
